overview: It's summer. Pierre goes out with Juliette, for fakes. For Juliette to see Stéphane in secret. Since the police are looking for Stéphane. Every day, while the two young lovers find themselves in a cabin lost in the middle of the forest, Pierre stays outside, alone in the middle of the trees. He is waiting. He is playing the game. Pierre knows how to keep a secret.
title: La Gueule Du Loup
